name: Disoriented
storyline: Suuna has had a bad day. First she has problems finding her friend during a game of Hide and Seek and on top of that she gets trapped in a vast underground maze with lots of tricky puzzles. Only you can help her getting out of that misery!
summary:
Explore a vast maze and solve various puzzles. Grab yourself a pen and a piece of paper and start drawing a map of your path through the maze, because there is none in the game! Or mark the walls with your chalk ... 
 
Fully voiced story in german with subtitles in english and german. Compatible with XBox360 Controllers on Win & Mac.
